title: Partial Application Schema
description: A simple schema describing a secion of an application

permitType.description: The type of permit (standard rules or bespoke, for example

permitCategory.description: The category of permit, i.e. which activity/activities the permit relates to (vehicle dismantling, for example

standardRule.description: A unique identifier/code used for specific standard-rule application permits

address.description: The location of a property, or business in the UK

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address (number and street, for example)

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address (area or district, for example)

postcode.description: the outcode, incode combination specified for the UK by Royal Mail
